dmca.title: DMCA / Breach of Copyright
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: World Guides [mailto:info@world-guides.com] 
Sent: Saturday, February 24, 2007 7:36 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: DMCA / Breach of Copyright

F.A.O. Andrea Z. Almeida

Unfortunately, an author for your client http://www.a1- 
optimization.com has posted articles which contain material which  
breach the copyright of our sites World Guides to Ibiza and Dublin.

We have contacted http://www.a1-optimization.com directly, on several  
occasions, requesting the removal of our material from their site but  
have never received a response to our correspondence.

Therefore, as per your Acceptable Use Policy, http:// 
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/Planet%20Acceptable%20Usage% 
20Policy%20AUP%20011507%20FINAL.pdf we wish to issue the following  
DMCA complaint:

1. MR. MARTIN TREASURE

2.The text copied is as follows:
http://www.a1-optimization.com/articles/Article/Travel-in-Dublin- 
Ireland/297
http://www.a1-optimization.com/articles/Article/Travel-in-Lanzarote- 
Spain/493E

3. The original text can be viewed here:
http://www.dublin.world-guides.com/transportation.html
http://www.ibiza.world-guides.com/travel.html

4.  Contact: Martin Treasure - director TravelSmart Ltd
Tel: +44 1373 454064
Email: info@world-guides.com
Address: 18 Wayside Close, Frome, Somerset, England BA11 2DL


5. I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by World Guides.


6. I hereby state under penalty of perjury that this information is
accurate, and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the
infringed materials.


Unfortunately, although the ghost writer of the articles and the  
company for who the material was "written" are aware of this problem  
they have not done anything to rectify this matter and so we have to  
follow this course of action.

Many thanks for your help, please advise if you require any further  
information.


I look forward to hearing from you shortly.


MARTIN
dmca.principal_name: World Guides to Ibiza and Dublin
